data.title: Inside Sales MANAGER (B2B)
data.description:
**Experience:** 8 to 10 Years | **Department:** Sales | **Location:** Currently Remote (Bengaluru) | **Number of Positions:** 2

**Mandatory Skills:** Inside sales, B2b, Database maintenance, MIS, Lead generation,Research, Tele-sales, Target achievement, Pitch, Inbound sales, Outbound & inbound sales, Manager

**Additional Skills:** Communication skills, Client engagements, Self motivated personality, Organisational skills

**MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE IN B2B Sales**

**MUST BE FROM BENGALURU ONLY**

**NOT MORE THAN 30 DAYS NOTICE PERIOD (IMMEDIATE JOINERS PREFERRED)**

###### **Job Description:**

**About the company**

Client is India's leading Employee Assistance Program (EAP) service provider with a reputation for quality with integrity, supporting organisations improve employee well being, through a variety of programmes. Global support Partner of 750+ companies covering of 4.5 million people. Certified in ISO 9001:2013 - Quality Management System Certified ISO 27001:2013 - Information Security System, also has the largest pool of counsellors (200+) in India with 20+ years of experience & 650,000+ counselling sessions conducted. Global partners include Lifeworks (formerly Morneau Shepell) and Lifespeak.

**Job Role:**

- Responsible for delivering the **qualitative and quantitative goals** thru a team of inside sales reps
- **Recruit, train and optimize a team of inside sales responsible** for **inbound** and **outbound** sales engagements.
- Refine the **sales pitch** and process to achieve optimum results
- Establish metrics and help the team improve by understanding their performance
- Manage **inbound lead flow** and track efficiency of sales and marketing programs
- Foster a high energy and a learning environment
- Ensure **adoption of sales tools and efficacy of data/leads**

###### Additional Information

**Your experience in the following will count:**

- Previous experience in **inside sales position**.
- Proficiency in **Microsoft Office and CRM software** such as Salesforce.com.
- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.
- Good **organizational skills** and the ability to multitask.
- Excellent phone and cold calling skills.
- Strong listening and sales skills.
- Ability to achieve targets for outbound leads

###### **Required Qualification:**

Graduation - Any Graduate

data.title: Project Manager (Local & Overseas ERP Projects)
data.description:
Pristine Solutions is an information technology company  that focuses on direct client interaction and focused customer service.  We collaborate with world-class tech-giants such as SAP and Microsoft.

**We are now looking for Project Managers to work on local and international SAP Implementation projects.**

**_Responsibilities:_**

- Manage various ERP installation projects and oversee work  activities to ensure projects are completed on time, within budget, and  within scope.
- Implement a project communication plan and arrange meetings to update clients and internal management on the status of projects.
- Establish positive working connections with all stakeholders and teams.
- In a timely way, manage all billing obligations for given tasks.
- Maintain the budget vs. the actual time of assigned projects.
- Encourage  team members' creative and inventive thinking while aiding them in  bringing their ideas and career ambitions to fruition.

**_Qualifications and Skills:_**

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business (Accounting), or Information Systems is required.
- Outstanding project management and organizational abilities
- Have a working knowledge of ERP solutions.
- A minimum of two (or more) years of experience as a Project Manager working on various large-scale projects is required.
- A PMP or comparable qualification will be an advantage.

data.title: Video Director
data.description:
Starting Salary: LKR 70,000/- (Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set and level of experience)

We’re looking for a Video Director with an eye for detail, strong storytelling skills, and great sense of good aesthetics to engage viewers. You’ll join a cross-functional team focused on developing content in support of sales communications initiatives at Pettah Effect.

Key Qualifications

- You have a passion for filmmaking, photography, design, and technology.
- You're conceptual thinker and problem solver who is wildly creative and also obsessively meticulous.
- An expert in all aspects of filmmaking, and are able to lead internal production teams as well as vendors, and direct professional and internal talent.
- Expert storyteller with a command of visual, communication, narrative, and motion design principles, including composition, framing, and timing.
- Flexible and can direct big productions as well as getting hands-on in smaller projects.
- Understanding of what makes content— everything from live action to motion graphics— engaging and successful across channels and audiences.
- Love keeping up with trends across all types of media associated with the entertainment, and social media.
- Deep understanding and hands-on experience in: cinematography, lighting, camera operation, sound recording, and video editing.
- Knowledgeable and hands-on experience with: RED cameras, RED RAW workflow, and ARRI cameras.
- Deep understanding of and excellent proficiency in: Final Cut Pro, Premiere, DaVinci Resolve, After Effects, and a diverse range of motion design software, plug-ins, techniques and approaches.
- A keen ability to build work as well as package and presenting creative solutions in an inspiring manner.
- Clear and concise communicator displaying strong organization and collaboration skills.
- Flexibility to travel domestically and internationally as the need arises.

Description

- Build impactful edits and engage key audiences.
- Have the ability to visualize the project’s vision in the early conceptualization stage and continual ideation with the team throughout the edit.
- Work well with key partners to ensure successful execution throughout the post-production process.
- Direct teams to produce video content, as well as touch all aspects of production from ideation, to video shooting, and postproduction.
- Methodically assess and resolve technical and creative issues.
- Achieve high quality and continuity between multiple projects while working against aggressive deadlines.
- Actively maintain expertise in the latest technology trends, techniques, and tools related to post-production.

Editing (Additional Qualifications)

- You have a proficiency of editing platforms Davinci Resolve, Premiere, Avid.
- Experience and understanding of post-production workflows.
- Proficiency in supporting applications such as After Effects, Photoshop, Resolve.
- An understanding of compression guidelines to meet proper delivery specifications.
- Understanding of, and ability to run the creative review process.
- Knowing how to address creative notes (directly/indirectly) so as not to destroy the underlying structure of what works well.
- Ability to maintain a highly organized project, from initial edit through various localization deliveries.
- Expert editor through a wide variety of productions (TV, documentary, marketing/social, corporate).
- Comfortable with both live action and animation storytelling.
- Understanding of deliverables across multi-platforms and aspect ratios.
- Passion for story structure and an eye for detail.
- Forethought for the end-users’ experience.
- Strong collaboration skills, team-focused.
- Strong creative mind to work alone and deliver results.
- Understanding of time management and project breakdown.
- Ability to simplify communication (verbally and as a visual storyteller)
- Passionate about the brand brand and relentless in preserving its authenticity

**Life at Pettah Effect**

What we need from Everyone : Join our community and help define it.

**Our values are part of everything we do here**

Live with No-Excuses

Do the brave thing

Be Humble

Play as a team

**About Pettah Effect**

“Enabling Everything Entertainment”

Pettah Effect is a place where extraordinary people gather to do their best work in every aspect of modern entertainment. Together, we “disrupt the status quo and create culture” through the power of artistry. If you're excited by the idea of making a creative impact, and joining a team of entrepreneurs, this is the place for you.

**What we do**

**We provide marketing services for Artists & Labels.**

1. Obsessed with turning artists into extraordinary experiences and icons, we design & build world-class digital products & experiences for artists & labels on the road to a platinum record and beyond. Our services include Strategy, Branding, Social Media, Web and Distribution

**Media Production for fans & businesses**

2. We produce, distribute and promote content to delight and entertain fans around the world. We partner with good brands to create relationships with their customers through Videos & Photographs.

**Bespoke Audio Studio**

3. Petrah Effect has a bespoke audio house that creates content for a wide range of media. Our clients and collaborators call upon us for original music, audio post, sound design, artist collaborations, podcast development, production and mixing.

**Talent Management**

4. Dedicated to introducing fresh and dynamic talent, we empower the same from across the globe to showcase their art and are dedicated to long-term talent development with a global perspective.

Pettah Effect works with artists, musicians, labels, brands and businesses in North America, Europe, Middle East and the Asia/Pacific regions.

**Play as a team**

We believe that each team member makes a significant contribution to our success of “Enabling Everything Entertainment.”

That contribution should not be limited by the assigned responsibilities outlined in a job description. Therefore, this job description is designed to outline primary duties, and job scope, but not limit the employee or the organisation to just the work identified. It is our expectation that each team member will offer his/her services wherever and whenever necessary to ensure the success of our “Empowering Everything Entertainment” mission and to pursue individual career growth.

**Culture**

- Bring all of you to work; your passions, your hobbies, creative pursuits and side hustles.
- Always look for ways to improve, better the output and look for innovative solutions.
- Lead by example, motivating the team by your high standards, reliance and determination.
- Embody “None of us are as good as all of us” which fosters a comfortable team environment.
- Bring forward ideas and initiatives, drawing on your experience and knowledge from outside of the industry
- Contribute to the Pettah Effect mission ““Enabling Everything Entertainment.” beyond delivering within your job role.
- Use every interaction as an opportunity to impress.

**Key Qualifications to Join the Team**

- Customer and partner needs can often be unique—but, you’re quick on your feet and connect and influence the right people both inside and outside of Pettah Effect. As a go to person with leadership, you are trusted and comfortable in tough situations. You can settle disputes, negotiations and own the hard calls with minimal noise. You step up to conflicts and see them as opportunities to shine.
- Understand there are many moving parts in an organisation. Navigating the interdependencies within the company, team and partner agencies is needed for success. Understanding how business financials work, and strategies for sustaining profitable growth, are key to staying ahead of the competition. You analyse the market and think beyond the short-term.
- See the world through the eyes of the customer by deeply understanding their business needs, challenges, and concerns. At Pettah Effect, we obsess over how people experience our products and services. You not only meet our customers’ expectations, but you exceed them.
- You are only as strong as the people around you, so you know how to contribute to your team
- Enjoy a collaborative environment with open dialogue and debate. You empower your teammates to do their life’s best work. When projects require extra support, you are eager to step up to the plate and bring your knowledge to the table.
- No matter the audience, you are an expert at presenting, and you’re cool under pressure. You make the sophisticated, simple and you command an audience by bringing them along for the journey.
- Strive for excellence in everything you do. Due to changing priorities, urgent customer needs, or a final push to meet a quarterly forecast, you face the daily challenge of where to focus your time and energy. You have a ‘don’t give up’ demeanour and finish, especially in the face of resistance or setbacks.
- Seize every opportunity and empower others to reach their goals along the way.
- Do you believe that communication is key to success? You’re an optimist and someone who actively talks and listens through endless possibilities—with customers and teammates alike. To ensure the most innovative ideas become a reality, you recognize perspectives, patiently listen to every detail and commit to what is right, in order to move us forward.

**Additional Information**

At Pettah Effect we support, celebrate and thrive because of our differences. It benefits our employees, our clients and the work we produce, and we are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. When hiring we do not discriminate based on race, religion, colour, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, physical or mental disability, nationality or any other characteristic covered by law. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need.

Please let us know if there are any particular adjustments we can consider to make the interview more comfortable for you.

data.title: Finance Executive / Accountant
data.description:
Starting Salary: LKR 50,000/- (Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set and level of experience)

Do you love thinking analytically? Are you passionate about using your financial knowledge to navigate complex challenges?

3. Petrah Effect has a bespoke audio house that creates content for a wide range of media. Our clients and collaborators call upon us for original music, audio post, sound design, artist collaborations, podcast development, production and mixing.

**Talent Management**

4. Dedicated to introducing fresh and dynamic talent, we empower the same from across the globe to showcase their art and are dedicated to long-term talent development with a global perspective.

Pettah Effect works with artists, musicians, labels, brands and businesses in North America, Europe, Middle East and the Asia/Pacific regions.

**Play as a team**

We believe that each team member makes a significant contribution to our success of “Enabling Everything Entertainment.”

That contribution should not be limited by the assigned responsibilities outlined in a job description. Therefore, this job description is designed to outline primary duties, and job scope, but not limit the employee or the organisation to just the work identified. It is our expectation that each team member will offer his/her services wherever and whenever necessary to ensure the success of our “Empowering Everything Entertainment” mission and to pursue individual career growth.

**Culture**

- Bring all of you to work; your passions, your hobbies, creative pursuits and side hustles.
- Always look for ways to improve, better the output and look for innovative solutions.
- Lead by example, motivating the team by your high standards, reliance and determination.
- Embody “None of us are as good as all of us” which fosters a comfortable team environment.
- Bring forward ideas and initiatives, drawing on your experience and knowledge from outside of the industry
- Contribute to the Pettah Effect mission ““Enabling Everything Entertainment.” beyond delivering within your job role.
- Use every interaction as an opportunity to impress.

**Key Qualifications to Join the Team**

- Customer and partner needs can often be unique—but, you’re quick on your feet and connect and influence the right people both inside and outside of Pettah Effect. As a go to person with leadership, you are trusted and comfortable in tough situations. You can settle disputes, negotiations and own the hard calls with minimal noise. You step up to conflicts and see them as opportunities to shine.
- Understand there are many moving parts in an organisation. Navigating the interdependencies within the company, team and partner agencies is needed for success. Understanding how business financials work, and strategies for sustaining profitable growth, are key to staying ahead of the competition. You analyse the market and think beyond the short-term.
- See the world through the eyes of the customer by deeply understanding their business needs, challenges, and concerns. At Pettah Effect, we obsess over how people experience our products and services. You not only meet our customers’ expectations, but you exceed them.
- You are only as strong as the people around you, so you know how to contribute to your team
- Enjoy a collaborative environment with open dialogue and debate. You empower your teammates to do their life’s best work. When projects require extra support, you are eager to step up to the plate and bring your knowledge to the table.
- No matter the audience, you are an expert at presenting, and you’re cool under pressure. You make the sophisticated, simple and you command an audience by bringing them along for the journey.
- Strive for excellence in everything you do. Due to changing priorities, urgent customer needs, or a final push to meet a quarterly forecast, you face the daily challenge of where to focus your time and energy. You have a ‘don’t give up’ demeanour and finish, especially in the face of resistance or setbacks.
- Seize every opportunity and empower others to reach their goals along the way.
- Do you believe that communication is key to success? You’re an optimist and someone who actively talks and listens through endless possibilities—with customers and teammates alike. To ensure the most innovative ideas become a reality, you recognize perspectives, patiently listen to every detail and commit to what is right, in order to move us forward.

**Additional Information**

At Pettah Effect we support, celebrate and thrive because of our differences. It benefits our employees, our clients and the work we produce, and we are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. When hiring we do not discriminate based on race, religion, colour, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, physical or mental disability, nationality or any other characteristic covered by law. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need.

Please let us know if there are any particular adjustments we can consider to make the interview more comfortable for you.

data.title: Application Engineer (C#/.NET/MSSQL)
data.description:
#### **Hiring Company**

A technology company based out of North America with a mission to help hotels drive operational efficiencies through innovation and advanced technologies delivering an end-to-end hospitality information management platform.

The core product is a cloud-based information management platform that brings together data from multiple hotel systems, enabling hospitality professionals to access their hotel data from one place and in real-time, thus, helping hotel owners, operators, franchisees and hospitality REITs automate the hotel back office and manage property portfolio performance to a tee.

#### **The Role**

The role involves providing development and support for C#/.NET based myPerspective application. The ideal candidate will possess a broad skill set covering C# development, with extended exposure to MSSQL scripting, automation, release management and systems administration. The role is most suited to candidates willing to embrace a demanding and varied but balanced and flexible work pattern, which would include covering US shifts.

#### **Responsibilities**

- Producing clean, efficient code based on specifications that is well-designed and testable.
- Be accountable for the Task, performance, scalability and accuracy of dashboards & reports.
- Hands-on involvement in all aspects of the software development lifecycle
- Create documents outlining and recommending operating models and processes based on collaborations (Design documents, UML diagrams, Best Practices, Troubleshooting guidelines, Release guide and notes).
- Build the capacity to scale and onboard hotels quickly and efficiently.
- Assess an existing implementation along the dimensions of security, availability, and performance and then make recommendations to align with best practice.
- Work with internal customers to document and assess reporting requirements. Additionally, the candidate should have a strong knowledge of analytic data architectures to assist in the development of a multi-tenant reporting environment.
- Assist the team in identifying core test cases for UAT work with Product Owners to ensure test results are consistently documented and reviewed.
- Form operational objectives by studying business and technical functions; gathering information; evaluating output requirements and formats.
- Actively contribute and provide clear communication at daily meetings, daily scrum, refinement meetings, and retrospectives.

#### **Requirements**

- Minimum 2-5 years of experience in C#/.NET development environment.
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, RDBMS or any other related field
- Strong knowledge in C# programming languages is a must, with exposure to .NET Framework, .NET Core, LINQ, Generics, Threading/Task, Entity Framework and other .NET related components.
- Experience in database design and DBMS systems like MSSQL, and MySQL as well as knowledge in Triggers, Views, Functions and Stored Procedures.
- Experience in MSSQL replication will be an added advantage.
- Experienced in querying data from multiple platforms/tools including SQL sources, JSON, XML, CSV, REST APIs
- Development experience in ASP.NET, MVC, WebAPI, HTML, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and JQuery web technologies
- Experience and/or knowledge of Bootstrap and popular JS frameworks
- Full exposure to SDLC including understanding requirements, OO design, design patterns, unit test, integration test, bug fix and deployment.
- Be able to test systems and find issues and bugs – white box testing from a development point of view.
- Be able to provide development support
- Experience in the development of file processing, task automation, software robots, and machine learning applications will be an advantage.
- Hands-on experience working with AWS, MSSQL, and GitHub will be a key advantage.
- Excellent communication skills (written and verbal).
- Excellent Interpersonal skills for developing partnerships/alliances.

#### **Benefits**

- An attractive remuneration package is on offer.
- Exposure to working with industry-leading technology stacks.
- Fun, flexible work culture with performance-based rewards and challenging tasks.
- Annual Bonus and other allowances/incentives etc.
